channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: BNPL made up for more than 7.2% of total online sales on Cyber Monday.

item.title: The rise of AI reasoning models comes with a big energy tradeoff
item.description: AI reasoning models used 30 times more power on average to respond to 1,000 written prompts than alternatives without it, a new study finds.
